subject: Introduce special discounts for all our customers
body:
Summer season is a great time to improve your health. For this reason CanadianPharmacy announced huge discounts as a special care for loyal customers. 
CanadianPharmacy sells low price products without compromising quality. No online store has such a prompt service, fast delivery, and high level of confidentiality. Incredible selection of products. With us you will never receive faked and counterfeit drugs. 
Thanks for being our customer.http://pharmssite.com
Sincerely yours, Wayne Hearn
